name: Helpless (LethalHax)
description:
In helpless the rules change every time you play, it's up to you to find out how they changed, with nobody to help you.

Main features:

  • Color based platformer
  • Meanings of the colors change every time you play (easy, medium, hard)
  • Controls change every time you play (medium, hard)
  • Controls change everytime you die (hard)
  • Challenging gameplay.
